organizations.name: central intelligence officer and junior intelligence

text:
Last Updated Monday, March 06, 2017 Advertisement 
Intelligence Bureau (IB) invites applications for the post of Deputy Director, Deputy Central Intelligence Officer, Deputy Central Intelligence Officer and Junior Intelligence Officer-II on deputation (including short-term contract basis). Eligible Officials apply within 60 days from the date of Advertisement in Employment News Paper (dated 04 - 10 March 2017 Issue). 
About: Intelligence Bureau (IB) under Ministry of Home Affairs, Government of India. Name of Post No of Vacancies Pay Scale Deputy Director/Tech (02 vacancies tentative), Group A, Gazetted, Non-Ministerial (Level 13 A in the Pay Matrix) to be filled up by deputation (including short term contract) 02 Level 13 A in the Pay Matrix Deputy Central Intelligence Officer/Tech-Telephone, General Central Service, Group A, Gazetted, Non-Ministerial 01 PB-3 ₹ 15600-39100 with Grade Pay of ₹ 5400/- as per 6th CPC Deputy Central Intelligence Officer/Tech, General Central Service, Group A, Gazetted, Non-Ministerial 02 PB-3 ₹ 15600-39100 with Grade Pay of ₹ 5400/- as per 6th CPC Junior Intelligence Officer-II/Tech, General Central Service, Group C, Non-Gazetted, Non-Ministerial 161 PB-1 ₹ 5200-20200 with Grade Pay of ₹ 2400/- as per 6th CPC 
Age Limit : Not exceeding 56 years as on closing date of receipt of applications. 
Eligibility: Officers of the Central Govt. or State Government or Union Territories or Public Sector Undertakings or Recognized Research Institutions or Universities or Semi-Govt. Organizations or Autonomous bodies or Statutory Organizations. 
How to Apply : Eligible Officers may submit their applications to their employers, who may forward the same along with the following papers/documents so as to reach the Joint Deputy Director/G, Intelligence Bureau, Ministry of Home Affairs, 35 S.P. Marg, Bapu Dham, New Delhi-21 within 60 days from the date of issuance of this Advertisement in Employment News Paper (dated 04 - 10 March 2017 Issue) (i.e. Last date will be 02/05/2017 ).
